comments.author: dtownsend@mozilla.com
comments.creator: dtownsend@mozilla.com
comments.text: For pages displayed in a tab it is useful to include a <html:link> element to specify an icon for the tab, however this seems to break XUL layout unless you set display:none on the element. We could do that on every page but it probably makes more sense to put a rule for this into xul.css
comments.raw_text: For pages displayed in a tab it is useful to include a <html:link> element to specify an icon for the tab, however this seems to break XUL layout unless you set display:none on the element. We could do that on every page but it probably makes more sense to put a rule for this into xul.css
